review_body: A lot of varity goods and very cheap. From there it is possible to take place Lotte and Bupyeon station.

review_title: Small shopping mall / markets attached to train station
review_body: These markets are the usual small shop experience with all the normal fare but with a uniquely Korean feel. Underground for the most part, they go on for ever. Good easy fun, jump off at Bupyeong Station and shop for a few hours. Good fun
